articles.author: Jim Boyle
articles.description: Upgrade to GHES 3.2 or newer by June 3rd to continue using GitHub Connect.

articles.author: Martin Woodward
articles.description: Mathematical expressions are key to information sharing amongst engineers, scientists, data scientists, and mathematicians. Today we are pleased to announce that math expressions can be rendered in Markdown on GitHub using $$ as a delimiter for code blocks with math content or the $ delimiter for inline math expressions.
articles.title: Math support in Markdown
